gist.headline: Instant Personalities
gist.blurb: Meet Personic: the newest app in our creative garden. Turn simple prompts into full character personas with matching portraits instantly.
gist.summary: Added Personic to the Creative showcase, enabling users to generate structured AI personas and matching images from brief prompts.
gist.impact: Creators can now rapidly prototype detailed characters with consistent visual identities.
gist.visual_concept: The concept focuses on 'creation of identity'. A digital character card or profile being assembled. The bee is acting as the creator/summoner.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a glowing holographic character card. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. A tiny pixelated avatar is materializing above the card. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'PERSONIC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
